**All Contractors must register with the Town of Edgecliff Village before pulling Permit, registration must be renewed yearly.**

**For any questions regarding New Water Service, Disconnections, or general Permitting questions please reach out to City Hall at:**

**(817) 293 - 4313 or at

The general contractor will be responsible for making sure all sub-contractors involved with the project are registered to perform work in Edgecliff Village and have filled outÂ the necessary permit applications at City Hall.

The general contractor will pay for all permit fees associated with the project. Registration is valid until end of the calendar year. If initial registration happens in December, the registration is valid until the next December.

Inspections require twenty-four hour notification prior to the day of the inspection. Inspections will be made in the afternoon between 12:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. No special appointment times will be accepted. The number to call to schedule an inspection is
